attributes.additional_details:
Ofqual has announced its aim to move to a summer-only exam season and a cap on resits for A-level students in England. These are the first elements of the widespread changes expected to be made to our exam system.

The watchdog has published the results of a consultation on proposed changes and we feel that these changes are unfair and unfounded.

Many of us are already taking our AS Level exams, and we are going to have our exam structure changed half way through our exams. This is unfair.

We call on the government to scrap the proposed changes to the A Level system.
